# About this Dataset
> This dataset contains **203** images of **1 class: sheeps** for the objective of **sheep detection!**.
Bounding box annotations are provided in the PASCAL VOC format

# How to use this dataset
> - Your kernel can be featured here!
- [More datasets](https://www.kaggle.com/andrewmvd/datasets)

# How to Cite this Dataset
If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the authors
